page.title: 09MY HOBBY
page.content: My hobby is collecting insects.First I get the equipment together which is a range of different sized boxes,a net,pins and{ a large needle which I kill the insects with by putting them in a jam jar of water.They become drousy and then I pierce the body between the head and its thorax . Afterwards I keep the insects in a small box which has been lined with paper or cotton wool.Sometimes I go down to the compost heap where there are some large wasps.I lay traps which are jam jars sunk into the ground.In these I only catch things like ground beetles but nothing spectacular. Any insects which I don't want I sell to my brother who puts them in resin which is a sort of liquid glass.My best catch was a dragon fly which I set in resin and now keep safely in my bedroom.
